alert.note: Alert for Custer; Northern Rosebud (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 11 at 3:43PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Custer and northern Rosebud Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 343 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Miles City, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Miles City, Twelve Mile Dam, Matthews Recreation Area and Strawberry Hill Recreation Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southeastern Montana.
